text: Apaniba nguibam bar anekɨarughtɨ, gumazir aghuir ziam ikia ian tongɨn itim, a bizir damamitam bar puvatɨgh egh, a uaghan uan borim mɨsuegh anemam. A kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgham, a dagheba bar puvatɨ, ezɨ ua tuaviba puvatɨ. Egh a uan aveghbuaba, uan amuir aghuiba, ko borir igharazir ikiavɨra itiba, a me gitagh ramegham. A mɨtiriam bangɨn, borir tuzir nar tam me danighan kogham.
